climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging. U.S. EPA Safer Choice certified products contain safer ingredients for human health and the environment.

features: Our Seventh Generation Easy dose auto-dosing technology measures the right detergent amount-every time. Just flip the bottle, give a firm squeeze, and you're done. One squeeze is all you need
6x cleaning agent: a powerful clean that fights even the most stubborn stains with 6 powerful enzymes and surfactants
Ultra-concentrated, ultra-convenient laundry detergent: 66 loads in a compact 23oz bottle that's easy to store, and easy to feel good about
Small dose, big clean: 60 percent less plastic, 50 percent less water, and 75 percent lighter than our 100 fl oz bottle
body.description: Life is complicated. Laundry shouldn't be. With Seventh Generation new easy dose Ultra concentrated laundry detergent, you get the right amount of liquid-every time. Just flip the bottle, give a firm squeeze, and you're done. One squeeze is all you need! Our compact 23oz bottle gives you the same 66-load convenience you expect, but uses 60 percent less plastic, 50 percent less water, and is 75 percent lighter than our 100oz bottle. With no unnecessary ingredients, easy dose power plus has 6 powerful enzymes and surfactants for a powerful clean that fights even the most stubborn stains. A safer Choice EPA certified product, it's also a great choice for your busy family. Easy to use, easy to store, and easy to love-our Ultra concentrated laundry detergent is about to change the way you think about clean. At Seventh Generation, we do business differently. We believe our products are healthy solutions for use within your home-and for the community and environment outside of it. We are always evaluating how to reduce their environmental impact, increase performance and safety, and create a more sustainable supply chain. We believe it is our responsibility to set a course for a more mindful way of doing business, where companies act as partners with other stakeholders to create a brighter future For the whole planet. Seventh Generation is proud to be a Certified B Corporation. B Corps are Certified to be better for workers, better for communities, and better for the environment. By choosing Seventh Generation products, you're joining us in nurturing the health of the next seven generations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean Scent Smells Clean!
reviews.reviewText: The clean scent is nice and not too strong. I like that the cap only lets me dispense a load's worth, because I am often accidentally over-pouring. That helps save a little money and prevents build-up on my laundry. Does not bother my sensitive skin, but I am also not so sensitive to detergent that I ever use the "free/clear" types.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The squeeze design allows for one squeeze per load. These bottles lasted for months and my laundry was always thoroughly clean and fresh!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This laundry detergent comes with a lid that will automatically dispense the required amount of detergent, which is very pragmatic. Instead of pouring the liquid into a measuring cap like most other brands, this one allows the user to bypass this altogether. As many consumers are now becoming aware, these concentrated detergents don't actually require too much for an impactful wash, so it certainly helps users regulate and prevent overestimation. The scent is nothing to write home about (or a review) but fine nonetheless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The product is great.... when it gets packaged correctly
reviews.reviewText: Hubby and I have been using this stuff for almost a year for our laundry (yes, a 2 pack has lasted us about a year). I have absolutely nothing bad to say about the product - it's good for his sensitivities (allergies) and it's great for my wallet. My only complaint is this most recent purchase, someone at the factory must not have screwed the lid on tight enough because a good 1/4 of one of the bottles was all over both bottles, the cardboard, and had leeched through to the larger cardboard box Amazon delivered it in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more lugging around big containers
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product, though I have found over time that we use a lot more single dose squirts than we initially did. I still buy it, bc I hate those big containers and hard to recycle plastics. I hate lugging them around and how heavy they are. I would like it if this product was still a bit bigger though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Seventh Generation has done it again. This product is very concentrated and only requires a small amount of soap for a washer full of clothes, the measuring device built in the cap is very good, thus reducing the value of PER LOAD cost. The quality is excellent, don't know yet if it will last the amount of washes they advertise as i just recently started using it and have not gone through the first bottle as of this writing. I recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is great detergent. Easy squeeze measured pour bottle. Clothes are clean and soft. Washer is free of residue. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Washes Well, but Smells Odd and Bottle Leaks
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. If I could give 3.5 stars I would. This does a great job getting my clothes clean! I want to emphasize that, butthis particular scent is not great. It smells like one of those colognes that are overpowering. I plan to buy a different scent next time.The bottle design is a great idea in theory, but in reality it leaks all over the place. I always end up with laundry soap all over my hands and on my dryer. I feel like it's kind of a waste if the soap is all over the dryer instead of my laundry. I get about half a loads worth of soap on the top of my dryer every time I use it. I just wipe it up with something going into the washer, but it seems silly to have to do that.
